data.story: In a world where emotions were fuel, Lila's heart was a petrol pump, dispensing joy to those around her. Her best friend, Max, ran on diesel - a slower-burning, more enduring form of happiness that kept him steady through life's challenges. One day, Lila's pump malfunctioned, leaving her unable to produce the vibrant petrol that had defined her existence. As Max watched his friend's light dim, he realized his diesel-powered contentment could be shared, and he began the delicate process of siphoning his own happiness into Lila's depleted tank. Together, they discovered a new blend of emotional fuel, more powerful and resilient than either had known before, propelling them forward on the highway of life with renewed vigor.

Grabbing the nozzle, he began to fill the tank, watching the numbers on the pump rise faster than he liked.
